_description: Evils of the times — one seven-line stanza in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Gula is samel[es]Luxuria is lawelesIra is
                        rithfulnessInuidia is holinessAccidia is
                        feblesseSuperbia in priseCupiditas is holden wys
NLS18721.Note: Margin damaged with loss of letters.
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 58.
